values:
sometimes, i dont know why I get so angry with you.

right now all i can think is that you are a hypocrite.

you tell me to quit smoking, and you're smoking now.
you tell me that you're beliefs are the reason.
but now your beliefs have changed.

you think we should enjoy life more.
and theres too much stress.
and thats because of "rules of religion"

i disagree.
society has placed those rules.
make more money.
live a lavish lifestyle.

that leads to stress.
not religion.

i think i liked you because of your beliefs and how strongly you felt about them.
i admired you.
it takes a strong person to announce their beliefs proudly.
and that was you.
was.

smoking pot.
drinking.
smoking.
denouncing your faith.

honestly, im just disappointed.

youre not what i thought you were.


I cant be with you now.

Dear Kayla,
How could you be such a fucking idiot?
you are naive and foolish.


you need to learn how to forget things.

become a bitch.

do not have a heart.


erase every important memory in your mind.

nothing matters to anyone else, so why should it matter to you?

stop letting everyone walk all over you.

youre becoming worn out and forgettable.


you need to become that girl from 4 years ago.

stop holding on and let loose.

who gives a fuck if you revert,
becoming a better person has gotten you nowhere.


youve lost that spark in your eyes.

you might as well be dead.

every time i hear your voice my heart goes crazy,
my hands get warm,
i start to sweat.

and i realize how much i fucking miss you.

all the stupid shit we did.
all the driving around aimlessly.

i just want to kiss you again.
i miss your kisses on my forehead.
i miss being in love with you and you having no idea.
i miss having you as my best friend.

i honestly think we're supposed to be together.

and i think you know it too.

this summer i'll prove it.

Stayed up all night thinking of reasons why I cant feel your skin


When in doubt, make a fool of yourself.  There is a microscopically thin line between being brilliantly creative and acting like the most gigantic idiot on earth.  So what the hell, leap.  ~Cynthia Heimel


So here I am.
Leaping.

I've been trying to write this letter for two days. I have papers sprawled across my desk trying to find the perfect words to say and a million of rough drafts of this letter saved on my desktop. I keep crossing out lines or deleteing paragraphs because none of this makes sense to me. I don't understand any of this or how it happened but the only conclusion that I can come to is I'm in love with you.

I know there is so many other things going on in your life right now & this is probably the completely wrong time to be telling you all of this, but that's why it needs to be said. It was now or never.

You told me some things yesterday that sparked everything again and it's driving me nuts.  I don't know what the hell to do. I want to be able to smell you on my pillows. I want to get into fights with you. I want you to be my best friend. I want the stupid drunken phone calls from girls you met at the bar telling me how amazing my guy is to be true.

So there it is.
The truth in all it's glory.
And I'm scared to death.

I'm going back to school.

fucking finally.

go me.

This past week has been pretty insane.
I really don't know why, but I'm thankful for the decent weather that we've had...
aside from the hail storm.
Thursday was awesome.
Kyle put my subs in my car & we went to the underoath show.
Kandace,  Joey & I had to wait in line for an hour & there was about 40 kids
that had beaten us down there we figured we'd be first in line - but whatever.

We met up with Ben, Matt, Tiffany & her little brother & his friends.
We had a blast...we pretty much made it up front & honestly - I
can say that I have never been that sweaty in my life. It was disgusting, but well worth it.

I can't remember the name of the first band...
but the lead singer was talking about how he hadn't been feeling well
I laughed and looked at Kandace and said "Maybe it's because your pants are too tight, sweetheart."
We died laughing & then he made a comment about having a beer gut & painted on jeans...
nothing was better than that.

His band was alright - but his guitarist was freaking GORGEOUS.

Then Maylene & the sons of disaster played...A-FUCKING-MAZING.
Dallas is such a beautiful man, too bad he's weird on stage.

Then it was Norma Jean - I had never seen them live until this point.
They put on such a great show.
Kandace was singing along & I was just trying to stand still to soak in the moment.

There were so many guys around us, it was hard to keep our place & everyone else had left us because it was too
much for them to handle. So Kandace & I kicked ass and took names & somehow ended up closer than what we were.

and then...UNDEROATH.

after seeing them play, I knew that I could die at that moment a happy girl.
we stayed in the crowd for 4 or 5 songs and we just looked at each other and knew we had to get out.
By that point, people were getting a little too violent & we were dying of heat stroke.

So, we got out & walked around.
We went upstairs & got matching shirts
and left.

I'm so glad that we parked where we did...
we pretty much got out instantly & we parked remotely close.

At this time, we were all dying of thirst and i only had 40 minutes before I had to be NPO.
So we sped to the closest gas station and got 64 oz. cokes.
I dropped the love birds off back at Joey's and drove home attempting to annihilate that monster of a coke...by midnight i had it 3/4 gone and I was ready to puke.

I laid in bed the second I got home and I couldn't sleep.
I knew that in 12 hours I was going to have my mouth hacked open
and I was going to be in pain for the entire weekend.

So, Friday 12:30 my mom called and woke me up to tell me to get ready...she was coming to get me.


We got to Dr. B's office at 1 and I was ready
I was having my severely impacted wisdom teeth cut out.

Apparently, I cried during the whole procedure and told a story about kyle knocking out his teeth...who knows.

As most of you know, I'm having this insane battle with my insurance company and they are refusing to pay for any of my medical bills.

SOOOOOO my mom decided to tell Dr. B about this, and he did my entire surgery plus all my drugs - for free.
I've never had a pro-bono procedure, but I am so thankful - that's 7,000 that I don't have to pay for.

Thank God my mom is once again in the dentistry business.

So, my mom took me to CVS, filled all of my prescriptions & bought enough ice cream products to feed all of the troops.

I got home and slept for a few hours.
Kandace came over after work to check up on me & couldn't believe that I was up walking around and smoking and eating.
I couldn't either.

Yesterday Mom and I went out and I picked up some McDonalds - it took me 30 minutes to eat a hamburger - the fries were technically impossible, so i fed them to my dogs.
We rented Shrek 3 for the wii & Arthur and the incredibles.

I beat shrek 3 in 5 hours & arthur and the incredibles wasn't very good.

Darren & Jordan called me @ 3:45 am and made me laugh so hard it hurt for two hours.
Darren was drunk & inturn confessed his feelings openly. It was amazing.
Around 7 we all decided to go to bed.

Today I was pain pill free and did about 7 loads of laundry.
I feel a lot better & I'm ready to go back to work.
I'M SO BOREDDDDDDD!

well that was my weekend.

hmm.

Packing is going well.

It's kind of weird to go through all this stuff that's been sitting here for 6 years.
and just throw it away.

And it's weird to know that in a while, i will never sleep in this room again.

last night i laid in the dark and looked at the stars on my ceiling and laughed about
when I first had my room done this way, i hated it. I couldn't sleep & it was too bright.

but now, i find a comfort in the constellations on my ceiling.

I thought of all the things that happened at my house
all the fun times i've had.
all of the horrible times.

just. all of the time spent right here.
right where I sit now.

It's crazy, after we moved here, for some reason I never thought that I would have to move again.
I guess I never realized that I would grow up.

but here I am.
almost 21.

having my own apartment.
a brand new car.
my own washer and dryer. [haha fuckerrrss, no laundry mat for mee.]
a great job
& the best friends I could ever ask for.

not to mention,
a closet the size of my old bedroom.

hahah.
It seems to me as if all of my prayers have been answered.

I'm pretty stoked.

Darren & Jordan are coming to stay May 12th.
& I'm really excited.

I can feel a world of chaos entering my life on that day, but
whatever - it's going to be a blast - just hopefully we don't break too much
in my apartment or throw my controllers through my TV.

we've decided that we are going to have a formal dinner party
within the first week that I'm in my apartment.

So, for those of you who live close - or even if you want to make that trip

I live in Hurtsbourne Crossing - across from the Meijer's on hurtsbourne ln right next to bardstown rd.

Call for the apartment number.
we dont need any random stalkers showing up.

well, its back to packing & whatnot.

xox

Listen.

You may be prettier.
You may have a better personality.

but backstabbing is apparently not below you.

I'm tired of you taking over what is rightfully mine.
Moving in like a little virus.
destroying everything in your path.
To prove to yourself that you can do much better than 
what you already possess. 
It's disgusting what you've turned into.
and I hate you every day for it.

You have someone.
So, back the fuck up.

and stop being a turbo cunt.

and stop fucking telling my mom everything.
and agreeing with her.

just to turn around & tell me how crazy my mother is.

you're the fucking reason she thinks I'm the anti-Christ.
because you're perfect & you agree with her.


but goddamn it.
I know the truth.
and I think you cheat.


and I hate you.

Nicole.


Thank you so fucking much.


You're right.
The CD is amazingggggggggggggggggggggggggggg.



Everyone else;

Infinity On High - Feb. 06 2007.

Fucking pick that shit up.
It's straight up glorious.

i like taking pictures of you.
& lying in bed just giggling at each other.
and me squeeling because you're next to me.
and smoking on the porch.
and driving like retards.
and making out randomly.
and eating subway.
and watching monsters inc.
and hanging out with your mom.
and playing wii.
and watching you play with scooter.
and catching you watching me in the mirror while i straighten my hair or am put on makeup from the doorway.
and watching you stare at the road while you're driving.
and playing on the jungle gyms on the beach.
and.
hearing you whisper in my ear that you love me.
while we get it on.


hahahhaha.
I LOVE YOU.

ladies & gentlemen...


my boyfriend:


& one more.
of us.
from my phone...

I
leave
in
EIGHT
hours.

now, with that being said,
I think I can scream at the top of my lungs.

I haven't packed a goddamned thing.
I've cleaned all night.
FINALLY finishing my room.

& not even coming close to knowing what I need to pack.

THIS IS SO GAY.
I'm such a turbo procrastionator.


I know that I need...

TOO MUCH SHIT.

I wish I could bring my flowers so I could enjoy them.
but, whatever.
maybe i'll get some more for my birthday.
who knows.

I can't wait until I see you.
I love you very very very much.

pray that I have internet access
or your phone might be ringing @ 11pm-3am.


I love you babay.

I leave for michigan in EIGHT hours.
I don't have one single thing packed.
Nor do I know what I need to pack.


My heart won't stop pounding.
& im hella dizzy.

HELP ME.

I waited outside for TWELVE hours.
It started to snow at hour number TEN.

but, goddamnit.
I got one of the last Nintendo Wiis in Louisville.

Thank you.

okay.
so i was just informed that 
a new fall out boy song was leaked.
by the boyfriend.


how did he know, before me?

& does anyone have a copy?

eh? 
eh?

do it.

So, I just went shopping.
And, I actually had fun doing it.
I've gotten a lot of cute clothes lately.
and that's really exciting to me.

I can't wait to do laundry tomorrow
and go though everything
and get rid of the shit that I really don't wear.
I hate doing that.
but,
it needs to be done.

I got a new jacket today also.
& a cute scarf.


Pictures soon to come.

It's been a really rough day,
But I know that things will get better.
No matter the outcome with
finacial & other issues.

On a brighter note.
I love my boyfriend, a lot.

He's such a good guy.
and mmm.
he's quite the gorgeous one.

also, pictures soon to come.
I leave to see him in 11 days.
Am I excited?
Fuck yes I am.

I dyed my hair blonde last night
well, not all blonde, just very dramatically highlighted.
and for those of you wondering, NO. it's not skanklights.

it's like 4 different colors
and it looks nice.
thanks.

once again, pictures to come.

My new job is great.
I love working with Kandace
& all of the other ladies that I work with.
It's totally worth the 45 minute drive.
TOTALLY.

Run nigga, run nigga.
Duck nigga, duck nigga.
Run motherfucker, run.
Run motherfucker, run.

enough said.

I freaking love my boyfriend.
forreal.

sup michigan.
I miss you.
and you are home to the hottest boy ever.
fyi.


I have no idea what else I want to say.

The vet told us today
that Misty has CHF [congenital heart failure].
and that she probably wont be alive much longer.

I feel like i'm loosing my best friend.

& i'm being such a baby about it.
and I take it out on Jessie.
and I wonder why he's acting funny
and then he tells me that his brother was shot over in Iraq.
so, everyone, pray for him.
please.

alright.
I guess that's all i want to say.


get in touch bitches.

MSN - kayluhkamikaze@hotmail.com  
AIM - Suppp Princess
Yahoo - Suppp_qt

xoxoxo

Last night was AMAZING.

I had so much fun.
I really really did.

I havent had that much fun in a LONG time.
but, I have so many decisions to make.
I know what I should be doing.
and I know what I want to be doing.

too bad they are polar opposites.

I need a sign.
I need to know what the hell I need to do!


I'm going to wear a band tee & sweats to work today.
& I know I'm going to run into Jay.
and feel like a total dolt.


akhajksfdhkhfksjfhskdhfsdf.
someone help me please.


fuck yeah.
Brand new.
I need to ask off for that day.

FUCK.

I love when you figure out things in life that you've been worrying about
for years.

My college = paid for.
My surgery = paid for.
My bills = paid off.
and I don't have to work during school.


thank god for loans.
haha.


So, here's what I'm going to do.

WORK MY ASS OFF FOR THE NEXT FIVE MONTHS & PAY OFF MY CREDIT CARDS.

Take out A MILLION student loans.
To pay for school for the 18 months that it will take to get my RN.
Take out LIVING EXPENSES loans.
Pay for my car payement & my surgery loan, if i'm in school, my parents pay for my health insurance & my car insurance.
Get a weekend job
This will pay for all the extras that I need. [ gas, clothes, money in case of an emergency, concerts ;) ]

everything is paid for.
chyeaa.

and once I have my RN
I'll be able to pay for these loans without a problem.
& be able to get a house.

finally, a little clarity in my life.
and i get to go to school.


thank you jesus.

I don't think that I'm going to end up going to NY for my birthday unless I REALLY work hard, which I might just do.

and then, after my birthday I'm going to have my surgery.
and my parents are going to pay my bills for whatever time I'm off of work.
That's my christmas present.

hahah.
YESSS.

I'm in such a good mood now.

the last time i saw your face was a warm summer night,
just like last night.

it's amazing how nothing has changed.
and how kissing you is better than ever.
yet exactly the same as before.

you're right, 
it would be funny if we ended up married,
but then again, 
it'd be perfect.

and i'd be happy.

god it's good to be able to see you again.
and feel your touch.
and see you smile.
and look at me as if im not real.

i like that you had to touch me to see if i was real.


i cried on the way home.
this is all ive wanted since you left.
and im so glad you're back.

even if its just until tuesday.

sometimes, little girls named kayla get really bored & chop of their own hair.


and it looks like shit.

this weekend couldn't come any faster.
and honestly, i'm glad i'm going by myself.

no bitching.
no whining.
and noone thinking that i'm just the ugly friend.

and if i want to, i'll stay for weeks.



haha.

I FUCKING WIN.
and in all honesty,
i'm jealous of myself.


and i can't wait to see the pictures.







so,
i got a new car.
and a new hair style.
well, just the old one back.

welcome back black&blonde.
you.were.greatly.missed.

& some very cute outfits.


chyeaa.
i feel important.
and i love the text messages you send me in the morning.


and i love the way you call me baby.
don't stop.
oh no.
don't stop.

Lately, I've had no quams with wearing my heart on my sleeve.
I've been getting everything out.
and letting everyone know exactly how I feel,
regardless of whose feelings get hurt.
and to be frank, it's amazing.

I'm tired of letting everyone walk all over me.
I'm too good for it.
and I'm too good for him.

and one of these days,
you are going to regret every choice you made after me.
and I'm going to laugh & and you will choke.

I may not be the cutest
or even close to being the thinnest,
but damnit, i'm the best you'll ever have.

this is my big fuck you to the boys who deserve it the most.
stop being shallow fucks
and look at what you have.

So, I know it's 2:21 AM.
& I really need to be sleeping
but, I'm SO excited & I can't sleep.
I get to see Shaant in 17 hours.
I havent been this excited in such a long time.

AHH I NEED TO SLEEP.

seriously.


the arch in your eyebrows
they tell the truth
just imagine what your back can do
and the dance floor where i do my best
is your, your mattress
the arch in your eyebrows, they tell the truth
just imagine what your back can do
and the dance floor where i do my best is your, your mattress

Arik & I are the most gangster ghost hunters on the face of the earth.

About a year ago, Alexa showed me this house waaaaay down Taylorsville Rd. that is haunted. 
Well, Arik & I broke in the other night.

Of course, we stole stuff.
& adventured to other houses.

We stole stuff from the other houses too.

& proceeded to leave everything on top of Kandace's car.
We also took a bunch of pictures.
Needless to say, 
It's some fucked up shit.

I officially believe in ghost.


Arik & I are going out tonight.
Joe is also going with us.

Crunkfest.

Lime Rice.
Queso.
Tortillia chips.
Mmmmm.

It's amazing. I promise.
I really need some more queso, but whatever.

So, my weekend was amazing.
I spent the majority of it with Mat & Caleb.
On Saturday we met up around 6 & drove around for a while - got lost downtown. 
Caleb was passed out in his carseat. He is the cutest baby EVER.
Well, maybe I'm bias, but he does look just like Mat.
We went to the Erma's, I got to play with Caleb ALL night.
And then we went home.*we realized that we left Mat's phone at the Erma's*
As I was leaving Mat's, Caleb kissed me goodbye. 
It was the most precious thing ever.

Went home - changed my clothes & went to Tiffany's new apartment for the party.
Got crrrrrunnk.
Woken up at 5 am to eat with Tiff on her kitchen floor [yes, we were that drunk.]
Ate some AMAZING lasagna that Shauna & Connor brought over.
Went BACK to bed, woke up 4 hours later.
Drove to the Erma's, got Mat's phone.
Called him & made him come to my house to get his phone.
[and so I could see him & caleb again <3]
They stayed until 4:30. Once again, I played with Caleb 
& I have come to the decision that I love that child.
So, I went to work in an AMAZING mood.
Had a very positive night.
& then went home, put on pjs.
And drove over to Mat's.
Stayed for a few hours & then drove home.
And that is the end.

Si, Good weekend.
It's funny how much I feel like I have my own family when I'm with Mat & Caleb.
Not where I expected to be at, at 19.

My mom thinks I'm too young to take on the responsibility of a baby part time,
but ANYONE who knows me, knows that a baby would be alright with me.

p.s. Mat wrote me an e-mail.
"i had a really nice time with you and caleb did too. you realy impressed me how good you were with him i thought you were awesome tonight id love to do it again soon. im sorry my music sucked haha hope you had a good time at the party

---M@T--- "

hehe. 

On a different note:
Dave should be here in a month.
and I'll be a married girl.
I'm starting to question my decisions.
Am I too young to be married?
Am I too 'boy-crazy' to stay with one boy for the rest of my life?
Am I just afraid?

or did I find what i've been looking for in another boy?
